00012 using Microsoft.Drawing;
00013 using System.IO;
00014 using System.Reflection;

00016 namespace Msdn.UIFramework
00017 {
00018     public class TitleBar : UIElement
00019     {
00020         #region fields
00021 
00022         private LinearGradient fillBrush;
00023         private Bitmap battery;
00024         private Bitmap signal;
00025         private Font font;
00026 
00027         #endregion
00028 
00029         #region constructor
00030 
00031         public TitleBar()
00032         {
00033             this.Left = 0;
00034             this.Top = 0;
00035             Assembly myAssembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();
00036             Stream batteryStream = myAssembly.GetManifestResourceStream("Msdn.UIFramework.Images.battery_70.bmp");
00037             this.battery = new Bitmap(batteryStream);
00038             Stream signalStream = myAssembly.GetManifestResourceStream("Msdn.UIFramework.Images.signal_4.bmp");
00039             this.signal = new Bitmap(signalStream);
00040             this.font = new Font("Tahoma", 8f, FontStyle.Bold);
00041             this.Foreground = Color.White;
00042         }
00043 
00044         #endregion
00045 
00046         #region properties
00047 
00048         public LinearGradient Fill
00049         {
00050             get
00051             {
00052                 return fillBrush;
00053             }
00054             set
00055             {
00056                 if (this.fillBrush != value)
00057                 {
00058                     this.fillBrush = value;
00059                     this.OnInvalidate();
00060                 }
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         public string Text 
00065         { 
00066             get; 
00067             set;
00068         }
00069 
00070         #endregion
00071 
00072         #region overrides and helper methods
00073 
00074         protected override void OnRender(Graphics graphics)
00075         {
00076             // Current rectangle
00077             Rectangle rc = new Rectangle(this.Left, this.Top, this.Width, this.Height);
00078             
00079             this.DrawBackground(graphics, rc);
00080 
00081             this.DrawBattery(graphics);
00082 
00083             this.DrawSignal(graphics);
00084 
00085             this.DrawCaption(graphics);
00086            
00087             base.OnRender(graphics);
00088         }
00089 
00090         private void DrawCaption(Graphics graphics)
00091         {
00092             if (this.Text != null)
00093             {
00094                 SizeF size = graphics.MeasureString(this.Text, this.font);
00095 
00096                 Rectangle rect = new Rectangle((this.Width - (int)size.Width) / 2, (this.Height - (int)size.Height) / 2,
00097                                                         (int)size.Width, (int)size.Height);
00098                 using(Brush brush = new SolidBrush(this.Foreground))
00099                 {
00100                     graphics.DrawString(this.Text, font, brush, rect);
00101                 }
00102             }
00103 
00104         }
00105 
00106         private void DrawBattery(Graphics graphics)
00107         {
00108             Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(3, (this.Height - this.battery.Height) / 2,
00109                                                         this.battery.Width, this.battery.Height);
00110             graphics.DrawImageTransparent(battery, rect);
00111         }
00112 
00113         private void DrawSignal(Graphics graphics)
00114         {
00115             Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(this.Width - this.signal.Width - 3, (this.Height - this.signal.Height) / 2,
00116                                                         this.signal.Width, this.signal.Height);
00117             graphics.DrawImageTransparent(signal, rect);
00118         }
00119 
00120         private void DrawBackground(Graphics graphics, Rectangle rc)
00121         {
00122             if (this.Opacity == 255)
00123             {
00124                 if (this.fillBrush != null)
00125                 {
00126                     graphics.FillGradientRectangle(rc, this.fillBrush.LinearColors[0], this.fillBrush.LinearColors[1], (FillDirection)fillBrush.GradientMode);
00127                 }
00128                 else
00129                 {
00130                     using (Brush localBrush = new SolidBrush(this.Background))
00131                     {
00132                         graphics.FillRectangle(localBrush, rc);
00133                     }
00134                 }
00135             }
00136             else
00137             {
00138                 graphics.DrawRectandleAlpha(this.Foreground, this.Background, rc, this.Opacity);
00139             }
00140         }
00141 
00142         #endregion
00143     }
